”Alexa, turn on Waterheater”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
HAM Systems offers Internet-of-Things (IoT) solutions that allow you data log data such us temperature energy and control electrical devices from anywhere in the world.

In order to be able to use this skill you need to have an account to our service at https://hamsystems.eu . You will also need our hardware devices available through our store in the same website.
